name: Tears of a Dragon
summary:
We all have inner demons that sometimes tell us to do the wrong thing.  
Savage Dragoon is in a constant battle to conquer the darkness lurking within himself...Also known as his "Dark Passenger".  
  
Where his story ends...You Decide...  
  
This game is based on a true story, that being my own and my constant battle against depression. Meet the people who have been a large influence in my life as well as members of my family.
